alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 1:31PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lassen County through 215 PM PDT... At 130 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Susanville, or 16 miles southeast of Eagle Lake, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Susanville, Aspen Grove Campground, Susanville Municipal Airport, Christie Campground, Merrill Campground, Junction CA 36 And CA 44 and Eagle Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
